resources.string: Please click on the buttons, or see "Help" for more details.
The Terminology button will take you to the command dictionary The Websites button will show various websites
Please start typing to display a list of suggestions. Click on any command to see what it does.

string-array.name: def_array
string-array.item: Install APK onto an AVD or connected Device
Open a UNIX based shell to connect to an AVD or connected device
Manage AVDs, update the SDK, create and update Android projects
Builds an app by running the build.gradle file using the gradle build tool
Graphically read and filter logs, monitor memory, CPU usage, download and upload files and manage a running AVD
Package manager (Used in the adb shell) to manage packages on an AVD or connected device
Take a screenshot of the screen
